## useTimeouts variable

A hook for managing multiple timeouts.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useTimeouts: () => readonly [(fn: () => void, time?: number) => void, () => void]
```

## Remarks

All timeouts are automatically cleared when unmounting.
